pix.efetuando: You are making a payment to
pix.ref: regarding the purchase of the Product
pix.step_01: Open your bank app and find the “Pix” payment option
pix.step_02: Choose Pay with Pix or Scan QR code
pix.step_03: Check the details and complete the purchase
pix.creditado_na_hora: Pay and will be credited on time
pix.ou_copie: Or copy this QR code to make payment
pix.cole: Choose to pay via Pix through your Internet Banking or payment app.
pix.expirado_1: We are verifying your payment, as soon as we receive your payment confirmation, you will receive an email with more information.
pix.expirado_2: If you haven't made the payment yet, click the button below to generate again.

modal.prazo_pagar: You have 2 business days to pay

modal.recebe_email: You will also receive the payment slip by email.
modal.compensacao: Payments with Boleto Bancário take up to 3 business days to be cleared
modal.proximos_passos: You will receive more information in your email with the next steps.
modal.detalhes_email: We send further details to your email.

error.1404: This product is not a subscription.
error.1405: There is no signature linked to this document.
error.0001: This coupon you are using is no longer valid.
error.BANK: Something went wrong with your purchase, please contact your bank or card issuer.
error.BLACKLIST_PURCHASE: After numerous payment attempts, the bank returned that your card was blocked, contact your card operator asking to unblock it and if you have already done so, let us know at greenn.com.br to release here.
error.INVALID_CVV: Invalid card security code, please check and try again
error.INVALID_CLIENT_DATA: Customer data is incorrect, please check and try again
error.DUPLICATE_PURCHASE: You have already purchased this product
error.PRODUCT_OUT_OF_STOCK: Product out of stock. Unable to complete the purchase.
error.CREDIT_CARD_OPERATOR: Something went wrong with your purchase, please contact your card company.
error.INVALID_DATA: Your card details were entered incorrectly, please check and try again.
error.INVALID_CREDIT_CARD: The card used is disabled, blocked or expired, contact your bank or card issuer.
error.INSUFFICIENT_FUNDS: There is not enough limit, Try with another card or payment method.
error.INVALID_PAYMENT_TYPE: Invalid payment method, please try another card or payment method.
error.INVALID_INSTALLMENTS: Number or value of installments not authorized, try with another card or payment method.
error.SUSPECTED_FRAUD: Transaction not allowed - Contact your bank or try another payment method
error.GENERIC: An error occurred while processing the purchase, please check the data and try again, in case of failures, please contact us for further guidance.
error.0404: No signature has been made with this document.

general.error_message: This product is not available for payment.
